description: Accession or identifier that most closely matches the biomarker term.
Change in entity and common name/gene symbole/short name.
example: rs1800562 mutation in hereditary haemochromatosis protein (hereditary hemochromatosis protein) (HFE)

description: Change measured in disease versus healthy individual.
Type of specimen used to access the biomarker (with Uberon ID).
Lab test ID associated with biomarker.
Source of biomarker with corresponding link to data page of biomarker within the source.
Free text to add meta data to the entry.
